manifestation.description: "Bright like a Blue-Clad Star, bearing jagged edges of complexity, and a temperature to match a Sayad of the Coldest Snow."
sensory_notes: Light: an icy, blue-white radiance that seems to sharpen shadows
Cold: breath ghosts instantly; rime prickles on nearby steel
Texture: edges look faceted, like a frozen wave caught mid-crash

wielding.rules_text: The Shehai is the wielder's soul given shape. When the Shehai is manifested, Wayn may Attack and Defend with Will instead of Fight. Those Will rolls gain +2. The blade is Weapon:2.

stunts.name: Ephemeral Feint
stunts.effect: Because Wayn at-Cindershroud is a Sage of the Sword and Ansei of the Cold Sand, when he imposes a situation aspect via Martial Art Maneuvers, he may spend 1 FP to forego the stunt's optional "inflict 2 physical stress" rider and instead immediately make one free Attack with his manifested Shehai against that same target.

stunts.name: Flourishing Fanning Strike
stunts.effect: Because Wayn's pursuit of Sagecraft in swords rewards speed and style, once per scene he may immediately move up to two zones. For the next two exchanges, he gains +2 to Athletics for vaulting, running, parkour, jumping, or dodging projectiles.

stunts.name: Locked Stunt Slot 3
stunts.unlock: Significant Milestone (Prereq: Proving Honor or further).

stunts.name: Locked Stunt Slot 4
stunts.unlock: Significant Milestone (Prereq: Finish Companions Storyline for Act I).
